channel.description: I make the web for a living.

item.title: Code and stuff!
item.author: the-wintersmith
item.description: Syntax highlighting with highlight.js. The theme used is tomorrow, you can find more themes here.

item.title: Switching to Wintersmith for blogging
item.author: peter
item.description: I’ve used WordPress, Drupal, and other platforms in past for personal blogs, and for the most part, they’ve always been overkill for what I needed the site to do. I love the idea behind static site generators like Wintersmith.
